description: The Organic Agriculture Centre of Kenya (OAK) is a non-profit organization founded in 2006, dedicated to promoting organic farming practices in Muranga County. Since 2007, OAK has been educating smallholder farmers on sustainable agricultural methods, providing technical support, and facilitating access to organic inputs through its sister company, Organic Kenya Ltd. The initiative aims to improve food security, enhance soil health, and promote environmentally friendly farming practices for healthier communities.
name: Organic Agriculture Centre of Kenya
